title: Top Level Pager
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user
custom_steps: WHEN the user is in the watch microapp
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to navigate to a “Watch Now” selection and a “Games” selection

title: You're too early modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch Tab
AND games are available that have feeds but will not start till later

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game too early from the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the "You're a Bit Too Early" Modal is displayed
AND the team logos are displayed at the top of the modal
AND the subtitle "There are no feeds available. Please come back later to tune in" subtitle is displayed
AND a GO BACK button is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game too early from the Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the "You're a Bit Too Early" Modal is displayed
AND the team logos are displayed at the top of the modal
AND the subtitle "There are no feeds available. Please come back later to tune in" subtitle is displayed
AND a GO BACK button is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is returned to the screen from which the modal was launched

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the modal is presented
AND the user leaves the Watch View
AND the user returns to the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the modal persists until the GO BACK button is pressed

title: YouTube Pregame modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch View
AND a YouTube game is available that is in pregame state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the YouTube game in pregame state from the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the YouTube modal is displayed
AND team matchup icons are displayed at the top of the modal
AND "Live on YouTube" title is displayed by Youtube logo
AND "This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for Free in HD on YouTube" subtitle is displayed
AND "OPEN YOUTUBE" button is displayed
AND (if audio is available) LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button is displayed
AND FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button is displayed
AND GO BACK button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the YouTube game in pregame state from the Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the YouTube modal is displayed (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps OPEN YOUTUBE button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the YouTube app is opened on the device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN The user taps the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the Audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the preview Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes back to the location from which the modal was opened

title: YouTube Live Game modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch View
AND a YouTube game is available that is in Live state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the YouTube game in live state from the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the YouTube modal is displayed
AND team matchup icons are displayed at the top of the modal
AND "Live on YouTube" title is displayed by Youtube logo
AND "This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for Free in HD on YouTube" subtitle is displayed
AND "OPEN YOUTUBE" button is displayed
AND (if audio is available) LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button is displayed
AND FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button is displayed
AND GO BACK button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the YouTube game in pregame state from the Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the YouTube modal is displayed (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps OPEN YOUTUBE button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the YouTube app is opened on the device to the YouTube stream of the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN The user taps the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app routes to the Audio EPG
AND the feed is played in the audio player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the live Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes back to the location from which the modal was opened

GIVEN a user on the Watch View
AND an Apple TV+ game is available that is in pregame state

AND "This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for Free in HD on Apple TV+" subtitle is displayed
AND (if audio is available) LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Apple TV+ modal is displayed (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN The user taps the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the Audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the preview Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes back to the location from which the modal was opened

title: Apple TV+ Live Game modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch View
AND an Apple TV+ game is available that is in live state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the Apple TV+ game in live state from the Watch Now Tab

AND "This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for Free in HD on Apple TV+" subtitle is displayed

AND FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button is displayed
AND GO BACK button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the Apple TV+ game in live state from the Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Apple TV+ modal is displayed (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN The user taps the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app routes to the Audio EPG
AND the game begins to play in the audio player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the live Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes back to the location from which the modal was opened

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Peacock modal is displayed (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN The user taps the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the Audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the preview Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the GO BACK button

title: Peacock Live Game modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch View
AND a Peacock game is available that is in live state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the Peacock game in live state from the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Peacock modal is displayed
AND team matchup icons are diplayed at the top of the modal
AND "Live on Peacock" title is displayed by Youtube logo
AND "This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for Free in HD on Peacock" subtitle is displayed
AND (if audio is available) LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button is displayed
AND FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button is displayed
AND GO BACK button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile of the Peacock game in live state from the Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Peacock modal is displayed (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN The user taps the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app routes to the Audio EPG
AND the game starts to play in the audio player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the live Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes back to the location from which the modal was opened

title: Blackout Modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is available on the Watch Now Tab that is in the future (pregame state)
AND the feed is blacked out for the user
AND the user selects the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Blackout Market modal is presented
AND the team matchup icons are displayed on the top of the modal
AND the description "This game is unavailable in your area. All Regular Season and Postseason live games are subject to blackout restrictions due to Major League Baseball exclusivities. An archive copy of the game will be available 90 minutes after the game."
AND (if audio is available) LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button is presented
AND FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY button is presented

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is available on the Games Tab that is in the future (pregame state)
AND the feed is blacked out for the user
AND the user selects the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Blackout Market modal is presented (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button from a modal during pregame state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app routes to the AUDIO EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY" button from modal during pregame state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN app is routed the pregame gameday page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is available on the Watch Now Tab that is live
AND the feed is blacked out for the user
AND the user selects the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Blackout Market modal is presented (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is available on the Games Tab that is live
AND the feed is blacked out for the user
AND the user selects the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Blackout Market modal is presented (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button from a modal during Live state
AND the user is entitled to listen to the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app routes to the AUDIO EPG
AND the game starts to playin the audio player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "FOLLOW IN GAMEDAY" button from modal during live state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN app is routed the live gameday page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "GO BACK" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN then app is routed back to the page from which the modal was accessed

title: Free Game of the Day Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged out user on the Watch View
AND a Free Game of the Day is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the free game of the Day tile from the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN The FGOTD modal is displayed
AND the team matchup icons are presented at the top of the modal
AND the description "Watch the full MLB.TV Free Game of the Day by logging in or creating a free account."
AND CREATE FREE ACCOUNT button is present
AND LOGIN button is present
AND GO BACK button is present

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the free game of the Day tile from the Game Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN The FGOTD modal is displayed (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects CREATE FREE ACCOUNT button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app is routed to the Create Account page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user creates an account from the Create Account page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is able to play the FGOTD

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the LOGIN button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app is routed to the Login page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs in on the login page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is able to play the FGOTD

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the GO BACk button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app is routed back to the page from which the user accessed the modal

title: No Feed Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND a live game is available which has no video or audio feeds available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the no feeds game from the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN render a modal with a title that says “No feeds available”
AND the description says “There are no feeds available.”
AND display the "GO BACK" button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the no feeds game from the Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN render a modal with a title that says “No feeds available”
AND the description says “There are no feeds available.”
AND display the "GO BACK" button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app is routed back to the page from which the modal was accessed

title: Subscription Modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN an un-entitled user in the Watch View

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a live or archived game from the Watch Now Tab to which they are not entitled
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Subscription Required Modal is presented
AND the team matchup icons are presented at the top of the modal
AND the description "To watch the current live game, upgrade your MLB.TV subscription for full game access to this game and many more." is presented
AND GET MLB.TV button is presented
AND (if audio only feeds are available) LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button is presented
AND GO BACK button is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a live or archived game from the Games Tab to which they are not entitled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Subscription Required Modal is presented (same as above)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user select the GET MLB.TV button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app is routed to the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in the paywall
AND they make a purchase
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is returned to the Watch View (NOTE: Future iterations will result in the user being taken straight to playback)
AND they will be able to play games to which they are now entitled on subsequent attempts

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in the paywall
AND they select log in
AND they login
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is returned to the Watch View (NOTE: Future iterations will result in the user being taken straight to playback)
AND they will be able to play games to which they are now entitled on subsequent attempts

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects LISTEN WITH MLB AUDIO button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will be routed to the audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the GO BACK button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will be routed back to the page from which the modal as launched

title: Spring Training- Audio Only feeds
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is present in the hero with only audio feeds
AND the user selects the feed
custom_expected: THEN the app redirects to the audio EPG

title: Hero Content-Live Conent
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing a non-game hero
AND the content is live
custom_expected: THEN a live indicator will be rendered

title: Hero Content- Non-live content
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is viewing a non-game hero
AND the content is not live
custom_expected: THEN a live indicator will NOT be rendered

title: Hero Content- Un-entitled to content
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is viewing a non-game hero
AND the user is not entitled to watch the content
custom_expected:
THEN a lock icon appears on the watch indicator
OR
WHEN the user clicks the hero tile
THEN the user is redirected to the paywall

title: Hero- Special Alert
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps: WHEN a game in the hero contains a special alert
custom_expected: THEN a special alert pill will be rendered

title: Hero Content- Featured Image
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a non-game hero
custom_expected:
THEN the background image will be featured thumbnail
AND a video title will be rendered

title: Hero- Game logos
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user n the watch view- Watch Now tab
custom_steps: When a user sees a game in the hero
custom_expected:
THEN the game will render an away team logo and abberviation on top 
AND the game will render a home team logo and abbreviation on the bottom

title: Hero- Pregame game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the Watch View - Watch Now tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user sees a Game Hero 
AND the game is pregame 
AND a game time is available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game time will be rendered

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user sees a Game Hero 
AND the game is pregame 
AND a game time is not available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN “TBD” will be rendered

title: Hero- Live Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps: WHEN a live game is in the hero
custom_expected: THEN live indicator will be rendered

title: Hero- Game Actions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Watch Now tab
AND there are games available in the games carousel

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is entitled to watch game video
AND the user is not blacked out
AND the game  is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a user will be routed into the “preferred” video feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is entitled to watch game video
AND the user is blacked out of game video
AND the game is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a user will be routed into the “preferred” audio feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is entitled to listen to game audio
AND a game is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a user will be routed into the “preferred” audio feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is not entitled to watch game video
AND  the user is not entitled to listen to game audio
AND the game is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be routed into the video paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is scheduled for later in the day (in preview state)
AND the game is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing happens (no action or navigation takes place (once modals are turned on, subscriptions modal will display instead))

title: Hero- Non-game Actions- entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is viewing a non-game hero 
AND the user is entitled
custom_steps: WHEN the hero is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the user will be routed to playback

title: Hero- Non-game Actions- unentitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is viewing a non-game hero 
AND the user is not entitled

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the hero content to which they are not entitled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a lock icon will be displayed on the hero tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the hero is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be routed to a paywall

title: Hero- Archived game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps: WHEN a game that is final is in the hero
custom_expected: THEN a final indicator will be rendered

title: Hero-Game with special state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab
custom_steps: WHEN a game with a special state is in the hero
custom_expected: THEN a special state indicator will be rendered

title: Hero- Partner Game (YouTube/Peacock/AppleTV+)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a partner game is in the hero
AND the game is in a pregame state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a partner pill will be rendered

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a partner game is in the hero
AND the game is in a Live state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a partner pill will be rendered

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a partner game is in the hero
AND the game is in an archived state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a partner pill will NOT be rendered

title: Hero- Game Tile Background image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch Now tab
AND a game is in the hero space

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the background image of the game hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the games “active image” will be rendered as the background

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the games “active image” has failed to render
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render the team matchup as a default image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  hide spoilers are enabled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the games “fallback” will be rendered as the background

title: Hero- Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch Now Tab
AND Hide Spoilers is set to ON

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image is a non-game specific image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters the video stream from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the the user will enter the stream from the beginning milestone

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user observes the hero
AND the game has a special alert
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the special alert is not rendered

title: Hero - Pregame Postgames shows- multiple states
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch Now Tab

Json for proxying the mast and stats endpoints to simulate all the listed scenarios can be accessed here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LoWdJRAbjxwqqL4yfRgNfLhBGsgpJ9aMI6huBDI8R50/edit?usp=sharing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game with a pregame show is in the hero
AND the pregame show(s) has/have not yet started
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the hero tile should display the start time of the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game with a only one pregame show is in the hero
AND the pregame show is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the hero tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND the hero tile should display club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Pregame"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game for which both teams having pregame shows is in the hero
AND the pregame shows are in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the hero tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND he hero tile should display “Pregame Show”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game for which any teams have pre or postgame shows is in progress
AND the game is in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the hero tile should display a "Live" indicator

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game has one postgame show available
AND the game goes final
AND the postgame shows are in progress
AND the game is in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the hero tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND the hero tile should display club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Postgame”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game for which both teams having postgame shows is in the hero
AND the game goes final
AND the postgame shows are in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the hero tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND the hero tile should display “Postgame Show”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game which had any postgame shows is completely over (MEDIA_ARHIVE)
AND the game is in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the hero tile should display "FINAL"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game has pre or postgame shows
AND the game is in the hero
AND the user has turned on Hide Spoilers
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all the behaviors pre/post tags should be that same as if hide spoilers were off

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the hero tile is displaying a pre/postgame show tag
AND the game is a perfect game/no hitter
AND the game is in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pre/post tags should display
AND the perfect game/no hitter tags should NOT display due to constraints of space

title: Games Carousel
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Watch Now Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN  any playlist has been fetched
AND a “games” section is part of the playlist
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a list of games will be fetched

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN more than 1 game is returned from a “games” section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a list of games will be rendered as a scrollable carousel

title: One Game in hero
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch Now tab
custom_steps:
WHEN 1 game is returned 
AND the game is featured in the hero
custom_expected: THEN a game carousel will not be rendered

title: One game in carousel
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch Now tab
custom_steps:
WHEN 1 game is returned 
AND the game is not featured in the hero
custom_expected: THEN the game will be rendered as a carousel section

title: No games
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps: WHEN 0 games are returned
custom_expected: THEN a game carousel will not be rendered

title: Game Actions- External Provider
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has pressed a game tile
AND the game is blacked out
AND the game has an external partner with a deeplink available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  deep link the user to the external partner

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has pressed a game tile
AND the user is not blacked out
AND the game has an external partner with a deeplink available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  route to the video player

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has pressed a game tile
AND  the game has an external partner without a deeplink available
AND the user has pressed a game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN route the user into the video player

title: Game Actions- FGOTD
custom_preconds:
GIEVN a user
AND the game tile is FGOTD

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is logged in
AND the user presses the game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN route the user into the video player

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is NOT logged
AND the user presses the game tile in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN route the user to the Free Game of the Day dialouge

title: Game Actions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Watch Now tab
AND there are games available in the games carousel

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is entitled to watch game video
AND the user is not blacked out
AND the game  is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a user will be routed into the “preferred” video feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is entitled to watch game video
AND the user is blacked out of game video
AND the game is tapped

AND a game is tapped

AND  the user is not entitled to listen to game audio

custom_steps_separated.content:

AND the game is tapped

title: Game Tiles - Pregame Postgames shows- multiple states
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch Now Tab

NOTES: Use the attached json to proxy the mast and stats endpoints to help test this ticket. If you use this json, you can refer to the games listed for each step. This json simulates blackouts in some cases to ensure that audio icon does not interfere or overcrowd the tile and everything presents clearly in the game tile. This is not intended for testing playback. It is only for testing the tile presentation.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game with a pregame show is in the games carousel
AND the pregame show(s) has/have not yet started

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for PIT @ CIN)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display the start time of the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game with a only one pregame show is in the games carousel
AND the pregame show is in progress

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for TOR @ TB)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND the game tile should display club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Pregame"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game for which both teams having pregame shows is in the games carousel
AND the pregame shows are in progress

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for MIL @ MIA)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND he game tile should display “Pregame Show”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game for which any teams have pre or postgame shows is in progress 
AND the game is in the games carousel

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for ATL @ WAS)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display a "Live" indicator

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game has one postgame show available
AND the game goes final
AND the postgame shows are in progress
AND the game is in the games carousel

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for AR @ NYY)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND the game tile should display club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Postgame”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game for which both teams having postgame shows is in the games carousel
AND the game goes final
AND the postgame shows are in progress

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for BAL @ CLE)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND the hero tile should display “Postgame Show”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game which had any postgame shows is completely over (MEDIA_ARCHIVE)
AND the game is in the games carousel

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for CWS @ BOS)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display "FINAL"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game has pre or postgame shows
AND the user has turned on Hide Spoilers
AND the game is in the games carousel

Same as all above with hide spoilers on
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all the behaviors pre/post tags should be that same as if hide spoilers were off

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game tile is displaying a pre/postgame show tag
AND the game is a perfect game/no hitter

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for BAL @ CLE)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pre/post tags should display
AND the perfect game/no hitter tags should NOT display due to constraints of space

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is a Free Game of the Day
AND a game with a only one pregame show is in the games carousel
AND the pregame show is in progress
AND the game is blacked out

(if using attached json, refer to the game tile for KC @ HOU)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game tile should display a "Live" indicator
AND the game tile should display club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Pregame"
AND the game tile should show the "Free" Label
ANS the game tile should show the earphones icon do indicate the user can listen since they are blacked out

(the purpose of this case is to test the most possible badges that can display at once to make sure there is no overlapping)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the playback is in a live state
AND the user is not within the live threshold
AND then a LIVE badge is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be fast forwarded to the live point

title: VOD/SVOD Player error handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched any VOD/SVOD clip

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the VOD Player is unable to play an SVOD clip- Method 1
(for this method replicate by blocking https://falcon.mlbinfra.com:443/svod?*)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display an error message

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the VOD Player is unable to play an SVOD clip- Method 2
(for this method map the response from falcon (https://falcon.mlbinfra.com:443/svod?*) to return an empty url (use attached falconEmptyUrl.json file))
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display an error message

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the VOD Player is unable to play the VOD/SVOD clip- Method 3
(for this method replicate by blocking https://mlb-cuts-diamond.mlb.com:443/*?* for VOD clips and blocking https://svod-fst.mlb.com:443/*?* for SVOD clips- this will take longer to surface an error since there are several retries of the call.)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN display an error message
(NOTE: You will have to wait a bit for the error message to display using this method)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the VOD Player is unable to play the VOD/SVOD clip- Method 3 (repeat replication step 3)
AND the feed becomes available (Unblock the call after one failure)Ah
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the clip will play back

title: Edge Cases- Do Not include in regression
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user on the Watch View

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is watching VOD/SVOD in the Watch app on a Pixel device
AND the user switches apps with the app switcher
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the conviva session reports that it is paused

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is watching VOD/SVOD in the Watch app on a Pixel device
AND the user switches apps with the app switcher 
AND then reopens the watch app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the playback is reported to conviva under the existing session

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is watching MLBTV in the Watch app on a Pixel device
AND the user switches apps with the app switcher
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the conviva session ends

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is watching a MLBTV game on a Pixel device
AND the user switches apps with the app switcher AND then reopens the MLBTV player
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the playback is reported to conviva under a new session

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is watching a MLBTV game 
AND the user reaches the end of the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN then the player exits to the previous screen AND the conviva session ends

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user watching a MLBTV game 
AND the user reaches the end of the game 
AND the player exits to the previous screen
AND the user clicks on and begins watching the same game that ended
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the playback is reported to conviva under a new session
